message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's unique features and the value it can bring to your business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000. I believe this is a fair compromise.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not ready to meet you at $950000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to be at $1050000. I believe this price reflects the product's value and is a fair compromise.

Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your continued interest in the product. However, I'm still not willing to meet you at $975000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be at $1025000. I believe this price is the minimum I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident it's still a fair price considering the product's value.

Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still not willing to go above $975000. I'm willing to make a final offer of $990000. I believe this is the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to meet you at $990000. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to be at $1050000. I believe this is the minimum I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident it's still a fair price considering the product's value. If we can't come to an agreement, I'll have to consider other options.
